info.title: Passolution Dataservice API
info.description:
The Passolution Dataservice API is a RESTful interface to retrieve entry requirements, visa regulations, health information and more.

## TARGET GROUP This description is suitable for suppliers of front and back office systems, as well as tour operators and OTAs who wish to deliver data from Passolution within the framework of the EU Package Travel Directive via their systems to travel agencies or end customers.

## AVAILABLE LANGUAGES The required data can be supplied in different languages. Currently the following languages are supported: * German * English * French * Italian * Spanish * Dutch * Portuguese * Polish * Russian * Bulgarian * Czech * Danish * Greek * Finnish * Hungarian * Norwegian * Romanian * Slovak * Slovenian * Swedish * Turkish

## API REQUESTS The API is stateless. Requests to the API are made using HTTP GET & POST requests. The API uses the JSON format as output.

## AUTHENTICATION The API implements OAuth 2 specification for authentication and authorization for private use and for providing services to Passolution clients. \ If you wish to provide services to our clients, kindly contact us to get your OAuth details (Client ID & Secret) which you will need for requesting access to API on a client's behalf.

## OAUTH ENDPOINTS ***Authorization URL***: https://web.passolution.eu/oauth/authorize\ ***Token URL***: https://web.passolution.eu/oauth/token\ ***Token Refresh URL***: https://web.passolution.eu/oauth/token/refresh

## HTTP STATUS CODES | Code | Meaning | Description | | ------- | ------- | --------| | 200 | OK | The API request is successful. | | 204 | NO CONTENT | There is no content available for the request. | | 401 | AUTHORIZATION ERROR | Invalid credentials used. | | 403 | FORBIDDEN | No permission to do the operation. | | 404 | METHOD NOT ALLOWED | The specified method is not allowed. | | 429 | TOO MANY REQUESTS | Number of API requests for the 24 hour period is exceeded or the concurrency limit of the user for the app is exceeded. | | 500 | INTERNAL SERVER ERROR | Generic error that is encountered due to an unexpected server error. |
## TEST ACCESS DATA To test the API, kindly request an Access Token by contacting us.

## QUERY OPTION FOR TEST VERSION The query options for the query with test access data are limited to 2 nationalities and 3 target areas. Nationalities: * Germany (DE) * Austria (AT) Target areas: * Turkey (TR) * South Africa (ZA) * United Arab Emirates (AE)

## Any Questions?

requestid.description: Unique Request ID identifying this request.

401.description: Authentication information not provided or invalid.

parameters.name: code
parameters.description: 2 character country code defined in ISO 3166-1

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Specify column to sort records by.

parameters.name: sort_order
parameters.description: Specify order for sorting.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Specify page number to retrieve records of a particular page.

parameters.name: active
parameters.description: get active records

default.description: no response description was provided for this operation

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: Get locations matching the given zip code.

parameters.name: zip_codes
parameters.description: Get locations matching the given comma separated zip codes.

200.description: Information of locations optionally filtered by zip code.

get.summary: Create a one time website login link for your users.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: Page to redirect to after logging in the user.

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: Username to generate login link for. Only allowed when using account access token.

username.description: Username of user the login link belongs to.

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: Language code for response content.

parameters.name: sort_by
parameters.description: Specify field to sort destinations by.

post.summary: Get list of destinations filtered by various parameters.

requestBody.description: Specify filter params as request body. Additionally, specify fields that you need in response.

documents.description: The 'document_code' key should be one of the document keys supported by API. The API will respond with list of allowed keys in error message if you send any arbitrary key.

immunizations.description: The 'immunization_code' key should be one of the immunization keys supported by API. The API will respond with list of allowed keys in error message if you send any arbitrary key.

information.description: The 'information_code' key should be one of the keys supported by API. The API will respond with list of allowed keys in error message if you send any arbitrary key.

code.description: 2 character country code defined in ISO 3166-1

post.summary: Get travel information by nationalities and destinations. Optionally, get shareable link to the information.

parameters.name: destco
parameters.description: Travel destination country codes as array or comma separated.

parameters.name: nat
parameters.description: Traveller nationality codes as array or comma separated.

parameters.name: return_regions
parameters.description: Return region / state codes (COUNTRY_CODE:REGION_CODE) as comma separated.

parameters.name: states
parameters.description: Return state codes (Germany) as comma separated.

parameters.name: dest3l
parameters.description: Destination airport IATA codes as array or comma separated.

post.description:
***Note:*** Shareable link feature may not be enabled for your account.
\
***Note:*** If shareable link is not required, a GET request can be made.

requestBody.description: Provide trip information if you need shareable link with access to requested travel information.

post.summary: Get link to share travel information easily.

show_country_info.description: Specify if country information should be shown to visitors.

cover_media.description: Selects cover media to be displayed on the enduser link. Use UUID retrieved from /travel-details/media endpoint.

200.description: Unique URL with access to requested information.

url.description: A unique link with access to requested information.

post.summary: Get status (if there are important changes) of earlier requests by using Request ID.

parameters.name: request_ids
parameters.description: Comma separated request IDs of requests to check status of.

request_ids.description: Request IDs of requests to check status of.

200.description: Current status (important changes) of given request IDs.

endpoint.description: API endpoint of the original request.

tour_operators.description: Tour operator content will be displayed on the travel details link for records with the given codes.

individual_contents.description: Individual content sections will be displayed on the travel details link for the given codes.

cover_media.description: Travel detail link will show a cover media which has the given UUID.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Travel Detail Link ID.

parameters.name: with
parameters.description: Comma separated codes to retrieve additional information. Allowed codes: requirements, subscriptions.

parameters.name: content_type
parameters.description: If requirements information is requested using the 'with' parameter, you may additionally specify if simple text or html content should be returned for requirements. Default: html

parameters.name: mark_visited
parameters.description: Whether to mark the travel detail link as 'visited' by travellers, ie: all important changes seen by travellers. These links will no longer trigger the 'unseen important changes' emails that are sent to managers if there are unseen important changes for a link.

cruise_id.description: Cruise ID for associated Cruise Compass cruise.

code.description: Destination code for the information record.
Code for nationality that this meta information record belongs to.

inherent.description: Whether the nationality was added by an API request.

added_by_user.description: Whether the nationality was added by a traveller on travel detail link.

tour_operators.description: Tour operator content will be displayed on the travel details link for records with these codes.

individual_contents.description: Individual content sections will be displayed on the travel details link for these codes.

cover_media.description: Cover media that will be displayed on the enduser link.

success.description: Whether the individual content was retrieved successfully. If not, an error message will be returned in 'error' field.

error.description: This field will contain an error message if individual content was not retrieved due to any reason.

success.description: Whether the individual content section was retrieved successfully. If not, an error message will be returned in 'error' field.

error.description: This field will contain an error message if individual content section was not retrieved due to any reason.

success.description: Whether the tour operator content was retrieved successfully. If not, an error message will be returned in 'error' field.

error.description: This field will contain an error message if tour operator content was not retrieved due to any reason.

cover_media.description: Selects cover media to be displayed on the enduser link. Use UUID retrieved from /travel-details/media endpoint.

language.description: Language to use for emails sent to traveller.

204.description: HTTP 204 response confirms deletion of the travel detail link.

parameters.name: countries
parameters.description: Country codes as array or comma separated.

parameters.name: cruise_compass_cruise_id
parameters.description: Cruise Compass Cruise ID to fetch requirements for given cruise's destinations. Kindly contact us if you don't have Cruise ID information for Cruise Compass.

parameters.name: zip_code
parameters.description: Comma separated zip codes to specify states for return requirements.

parameters.name: zip_location
parameters.description: Comma separated location names if the zip_code parameter contains zip code belonging to more than one state.

parameters.name: target-device
parameters.description: Send this parameter if the content is to be displayed on a device with limited screen space.

documents.description: There will be multiple records for different documents under their corresponding 'document_code' key. These keys may change / be removed and new keys may be added.
The 'document_code' key should be one of the document keys supported by API. The API will respond with list of allowed keys in error message if you send any arbitrary key.
